project.name: |-- 006-inheritance-in-inner-classes
project.description:
Keywords: + Inner Classes + Inheritance
InheritInner: This class demonstrates the syntax to inherit from an inner class. It also shows how you're forced to provide a constructor in the subclass that calls the constructor of the outer class you're inheriting from.
LoggerTest: Demonstrates the peculiarities of inheritance with inner classes in an example that involves several implementations of Logger.
The classes include simple runners that can be executed as java program.
